name: Gilles de Bees
description:
How did the Renaissance masters harness the creative power to compose such delicate and detailed motets?

Why, BEES, of course!

You are Gilles de Bees, and you have a deadline to meet. Collect notes from the page for your unwitting partner in composition, and see what happens when the pope wants music and he wants it NOW!

Follow your buzzy trails and collect notes with arrow keys.

Music is "De Plus en Plus se Renouvelle" by Gilles Binchois, arranged by Isabella Ness.

Mild language and slightly-rude humor.

Made with Bitsy HD, a tool by Von Bednar based on Adam Le Doux's Bitsy.
Big thanks to the other helpful tools used:
Image To Bitsy HD by synth_ruiner
Add Bitsy Audio by Mark Wonnacott
